hero.name: Andi Montilla
hero.title: SR Full Stack Developer
paragraph: With 5+ years of hands-on versatile experience as a Full Stack Developer, I build powerful and scalable applications that bridge front-end flair with back-end resilience. I thrive on collaboration with cross-functional teams, often leading agile groups of 5-10 to deliver impactful, user-centered projects. Known for my creative problem-solving and keen eye for debugging, I bring a balance of technical skill and innovation, consistently turning complex challenges into seamless, efficient solutions. Whether working under tight timelines or exploring the next big idea, I'm committed to crafting tech that makes the difference.

Beyond the code, I'm a proactive communicator and strategic thinker who thrives in dynamic, fast-paced environments. Very passionate about keeping up with emerging technologies, always seeking out tools and methods to elevate both my team's productivity and the user experience. My approach combines technical depth with a user-first mindset, ensuring every project not only meets requirements but also resonates with end-users. I'm driven by the challenge of transforming complex ideas into streamlined, intuitive applications that push boundaries and deliver real value.
